scripts.copy: cp -rf src/assets dist && cp -rf src/fonts dist && cp -f src/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/css
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && pug src/index.pug src/bonus.pug -o dist/ && babel src/js/app.js -o dist/js/app.min.js && babel src/js/ui.js -o dist/js/ui.min.js && stylus src/css/loader.styl -o dist/css/stylesheet.css && npm run copy
scripts.watch: concurrently 'stylus -w src/css/loader.styl -o dist/css/stylesheet.css' 'pug -w src/index.pug -o dist/' 'babel src/js/app.js -w -o dist/js/app.min.js' 'babel src/js/ui.js -w -o dist/js/ui.min.js'
